t: Alibaba vs. Amazon - Is Alibaba Bigger Than Amazon?
s: October 17, 2023 - If you run a business and want to sell directly to people in China, then TMall is the route to go down. This is probably equivalent to Amazon Seller accounts in the United States. Businesses head to TMall, list their products, and then they get added to the marketplace.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
